parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Filename of macro to run (do not include a path)

parameters.name: ModuleName
parameters.description: Module of specified macro to run

parameters.name: ProcedureName
parameters.description: Procedure of specified macro to run

title: ISldWorks.RunAttachedMacro
description: Runs the specified attached macro, module, and procedure.
signature:
System.Boolean RunAttachedMacro( 
   System.String
FileName
,
   System.String
ModuleName
,
   System.String
ProcedureName
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Filename of macro to run (do not include a path)

parameters.name: ModuleName
parameters.description: Module of specified macro to run

parameters.name: ProcedureName
parameters.description: Procedure of specified macro to run

returns: True if macro runs, false if not
remarks: An example of an attached macro is a macro that is attached to the active document's Design Binder.
